channel.title: Question on coding
channel.description: when ever ur coding and it askes like Add this boolean wherever you see fit...... can i put it wherever i want? :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 06:09:32 AM[/size][hr]can anyone help?

item.title: Question on coding
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:14, topic:68643”][quote author=i0wnuall link=topic=100600.msg1023905#msg1023905 date=1174239199]
ummm ok but does it have to be in somr specifice order with the other booleans? will this not work?

[hr]

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public String cannonowner;
public boolean cannonowner() {
if(playerName == cannonowner){
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}

[/quote]

That would work fine; albeit not very easy to read.[/quote]

Once again, he’s the best of the best.

[hr]

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:15, topic:68643”]p0mg you just search for boolean and add your boolean right above it.[quote author=Slivion link=topic=100600.msg1023911#msg1023911 date=1174239307]
Adding a boolean.
It’s basically searching,

Boolean

Then adding it above that.
[/quote][/quote]

Exactly what i said.

Read full topic

item.title: Question on coding
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Yes,
So open up your client,
Hold ctrl and f,
Search,

Boolean

Then add the boolean above that.

Read full topic

item.title: Question on coding
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

No, like I said you need to place your booleans with your othe booleans.

EDIT: No, it just has to be with your other booleans.

Read full topic

item.title: Question on coding
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well, you can just put “public boolean nameOfTheBooleanYourePutting” in there, if it isn’t inside any braces, lile

public boolean MY_BOOLEAN_BITCH;

would be fine,

{ public boolean A_BOOLEAN_BITCH; }

wouldn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Question on coding
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

You add booleans with your other booleans. Search for public boolean and then put the boolean you need to add above it.

Read full topic
